RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT c.Module, m.Module_Desc, c.Class_Code, c.Class_Description, c.Restriction_Type FROM Oltms_Class c, Smtbs_Modules m WHERE c.Module = m.Module_Id AND m.Module_Id IN ('OL', 'LB', 'LP', 'FC', 'TL') AND c.Class_Type = 'CR' AND c.Record_Stat = 'O' AND c.Once_Auth = 'Y' ORDER BY Module, Class_Code
SELECT CUST_CAT, CUST_CAT_DESC FROM STTMS_CUSTOMER_CAT WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y'
SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_CATEGORY,SHORT_NAME, CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y'
SELECT c.Class_Code, c.Class_Description, c.Restriction_Type FROM Oltms_Class c WHERE c.Module = ? AND c.Class_Type = 'CR' AND c.Record_Stat = 'O' AND c.Once_Auth = 'Y' ORDER BY Class_Code
